product_name: Marin Wildcat Trail WFG Disc Women's Bike - 2014
long_description: Don't think twice about riding hard over tough terrain. Thanks to a lightweight frame with 100mm suspension, the Marin Wildcat Trail WFG Disc women's mountain bike always offers a comfortable ride. Light and sturdy 6061 aluminum frame boasts double-butted top and down tubes for strength; women-specific design includes a sloped top tube. Suntour XCM suspension fork features 100mm of travel with lockout. 27 gear combinations make easy work of spinning up mountains and flying down flowing trails. Shimano Altus shifters and front derailleur plus Shimano Acera rear derailleur provide responsive shifting. Tektro HD-M301 WS hydraulic disc brakes offer powerful, controlled deceleration. Schwalbe Black Jack tires offer plenty of trail-biting tread for great grip on slick or uneven terrain. Specs on the Marin Wildcat Trail WFG Disc women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: Don't think twice about riding hard over tough terrain. Thanks to a lightweight frame with 100mm suspension, the Marin Wildcat Trail WFG Disc women's mountain bike always offers a comfortable ride.
